CreateParallelData.name: CreateParallelData
CreateParallelData.description: Grants permission to create a Parallel Data

DeleteParallelData.name: DeleteParallelData
DeleteParallelData.description: Grants permission to delete a Parallel Data

DeleteTerminology.name: DeleteTerminology
DeleteTerminology.description: Grants permission to delete a terminology

DescribeTextTranslationJob.name: DescribeTextTranslationJob
DescribeTextTranslationJob.description: Grants permission to get the properties associated with an asynchronous batch translation job

GetParallelData.name: GetParallelData
GetParallelData.description: Grants permission to get a Parallel Data

GetTerminology.name: GetTerminology
GetTerminology.description: Grants permission to retrieve a terminology

ImportTerminology.name: ImportTerminology
ImportTerminology.description: Grants permission to create or update a terminology, depending on whether or not one already exists for the given terminology name

ListLanguages.name: ListLanguages
ListLanguages.description: Grants permission to list supported languages

ListParallelData.name: ListParallelData
ListParallelData.description: Grants permission to list Parallel Data associated with your account

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list tags for a resource

ListTerminologies.name: ListTerminologies
ListTerminologies.description: Grants permission to list terminologies associated with your account

ListTextTranslationJobs.name: ListTextTranslationJobs
ListTextTranslationJobs.description: Grants permission to list batch translation jobs that you have submitted

StartTextTranslationJob.name: StartTextTranslationJob
StartTextTranslationJob.description: Grants permission to start an asynchronous batch translation job. Batch translation jobs can be used to translate large volumes of text across multiple documents at once

StopTextTranslationJob.name: StopTextTranslationJob
StopTextTranslationJob.description: Grants permission to stop an asynchronous batch translation job that is in progress

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to tag a resource with given key value pairs

TranslateDocument.name: TranslateDocument
TranslateDocument.description: Grants permission to translate a document from a source language to a target language

TranslateText.name: TranslateText
TranslateText.description: Grants permission to translate text from a source language to a target language

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to untag a resource with given key

UpdateParallelData.name: UpdateParallelData
UpdateParallelData.description: Grants permission to update an existing Parallel Data
